## Props

<Props of={Image} />

## Examples

<br />

### 1. With fallback

<Preview>
  <Image
    src="https://wrong-url.com"
    alt="Placeholder"
    fallback="https://via.placeholder.com/1600x600.jpg?text=fallback-1600x600"
  />
</Preview>

### 2. With srcset

Resize browser window to see effect.

<Preview>
  <Image
    src="https://via.placeholder.com/1600x600.jpg?text=1600x600"
    alt="Placeholder"
    srcset={[
      {
        src: 'https://via.placeholder.com/1600x600.jpg?text=1600x600',
        condition: '1600w',
      },
      {
        src: 'https://via.placeholder.com/1024x400.jpg?text=1024x400',
        condition: '1024w',
      },
      {
        src: 'https://via.placeholder.com/768x300.jpg?text=768x300',
        condition: '768w',
      },
      {
        src: 'https://via.placeholder.com/480x200.jpg?text=480x200',
        condition: '480w',
      },
    ]}
  />
</Preview>

### 2. With sizes

Resize browser window to see effect.

<Preview>
  <Image
    src="https://via.placeholder.com/1600x600.jpg?text=1600x600"
    alt="Placeholder"
    srcset={[
      {
        src: 'https://via.placeholder.com/1600x600.jpg?text=1600x600',
        condition: '1600w',
      },
      {
        src: 'https://via.placeholder.com/1024x400.jpg?text=1024x400',
        condition: '1024w',
      },
      {
        src: 'https://via.placeholder.com/768x300.jpg?text=768x300',
        condition: '768w',
      },
      {
        src: 'https://via.placeholder.com/480x200.jpg?text=480x200',
        condition: '480w',
      },
    ]}
    sizes={[
      {
        size: '768px',
        condition: '(min-width: 1024px)',
      },
      {
        size: '1024px',
        condition: '(min-width: 768px)',
      },
      {
        size: '480px',
        condition: '(max-width: 767px)',
      },
    ]}
  />
</Preview>

### 4. Hide on error

Hide image in case of error.

<Preview>
  <Image src="https://wrong-url.com" alt="Placeholder" />
</Preview>

### 5. Loader

Show loader.

<Preview>
  <Image
    loader
    src="placeholder.png"
    alt="Placeholder"
    width={180}
    minWidth={180}
    height={150}
    minHeight={150}
    onError={() => {
      /* Just for demonstration purposes overload this method */
    }}
    onLoad={() => {
      /* Just for demonstration purposes overload this method */
    }}
  />
</Preview>

Custom loader image (image url or base64 image).

<Preview>
  <Image
    loader={
      'data:image/svg+xml;base64,'
    }
    src="placeholder.png"
    alt="Placeholder"
    width={180}
    minWidth={180}
    height={150}
    minHeight={150}
    style={{backgroundSize: 50}}
    onError={() => {
      /* Just for demonstration purposes overload this method */
    }}
    onLoad={() => {
      /* Just for demonstration purposes overload this method */
    }}
  />
</Preview>
